content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is committed to providing a safe and healthy workplace.  A significant aspect of this commitment is addressing COVID-19 in our workplaces and at client sites.  The best way to protect each other and stop the spread of COVID-19 is through vaccination. EPAM strongly urges all employees to be vaccinated, for the health and safety of themselves and those around them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before visiting any EPAM or client workplace, employees must (i) be fully vaccinated* and (ii) provide documentation to EPAM evidencing their vaccination through the identified process.  Details on these requirements are below. Please read this entire Policy before visiting any EPAM or client workplace.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contractors will be subject to this Policy as well, and are included in the term employee below, solely for purpose of this Policy.    \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Continued Applicability of Other COVID-19 Protocols\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Policy is a key part of our overall strategy and commitment to maintaining a safe and healthy workplace in light COVID-19. This Policy is designed for use together with, and not as a substitute for, other COVID-19 prevention measures that may be in place at any EPAM or client workplace, which may include for example additional measures on masking, social distancing, hygiene, health screening, etc.  To confirm any other measures in place at any EPAM workplace you may visit, please contact the respective Office Specialist supporting that workplace.  To confirm any other measures in place at any client workplace you may visit, please contact a member of the respective EPAM account management team.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vaccination Requirement Details\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM requires all employees that will visit any EPAM or client workplace to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees that are fully remote and not required to be at an EPAM or client workplace are not required to be vaccinated under this Policy.  However, if employees that usually work remote do have an occasional need to visit a workplace, even if just for a single meeting, then the employee must be vaccinated and follow the requirements of this Policy.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An employee qualifies as fully vaccinated 2 weeks after completing the second shot of the Pfizer or Moderna vaccine, or 2 weeks after receiving the single shot of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine, or 2 weeks after completing the full regiment of any other vaccine listed for emergency use by the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://covid19.trackvaccines.org/agency/who\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"World Health Organization\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vaccination-related Time Off\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees will not have time or pay reduced in connection with time spent receiving a vaccine, up to four (4) hours.  Time in excess of four (4) hours should be reported in VTS per our PTO Policy.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Face Coverings\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Until further notice, a face covering must be worn by all employees in the workplace, except for when an employee is alone in a room with floor to ceiling walls and a closed door, and while eating or drinking. If a group (2 or more) of fully vaccinated employees are co-located in a room and all agree to removing masks, this is also allowed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Acceptable face coverings are:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medical or isolation masks that are FDA-cleared or authorized by an FDA EUA; or\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any other covering made of at least 2 layers of a tightly woven breathable fabric, such as cotton, and worn over the nose and mouth to contain the wearer's potentially infectious respiratory particles produced when they cough, sneeze, or talk.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Violations of the Policy\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees who fail to comply with these requirements may not enter any EPAM or client worksite.  Any individual that enters a workplace without fulfilling the full vaccination requirements will be subject to discipline up to and including possible termination of employment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Additionally, criminal penalties may apply in the event of supplying false/fraudulent information or documentation relating to vaccination status.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Accommodation Requests\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an individual that is required to attend a workplace is unable to be fully vaccinated based on a genuinely held religious belief, please contact your People Partner. You will be asked to provide a detailed and accurate signed attestation regarding your religious belief and the reason it restricts you from receiving a vaccination.  All requests for religious accommodations under this Policy will be reviewed by EPAM’s Chief People Officer.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an individual is unable to be fully vaccinated based on a disability or medical condition, please contact your People Partner.  You will be provided further instructions on how to initiate a request for a reasonable accommodation, which will include providing a physician certification.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All accommodation requests will be reviewed and responded to individually.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Policy Administration and Questions\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s U.S. People Management Team is responsible for administering and enforcing this Policy. It is being made available to all U.S. based employees via the Onboarding platform and will be further accessible in the Handbook.  If you have any questions about this Policy, please contact your People Partner.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No employee will be discriminated against or retaliated against for reporting any work-related injuries or illness, reporting any complaint about violations of this Policy, or taking actions under this Policy.  Any concerns regarding violations of the Policy can be raised to your People Partner or through any of the other reporting avenues identified in EPAM’s Code of Ethical Conduct.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Policy Modification\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Government and public health guidelines and restrictions and business and industry best practices regarding COVID-19 and COVID-19 vaccines are changing rapidly as new information becomes available and further research is conducted. EPAM may modify this Policy at any time in its sole discretion to adapt to changing circumstances and business needs, consistent with its commitment to maintaining a safe and healthy workplace and compliance with law. The latest version of the policy can always be found \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/usa/all-cities/expectations-of-you/u-s--employee-covid-19-vaccination-policy.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Process to provide Vaccination Record prior to workplace visit\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to visiting any EPAM or client workplace, an employee must upload proof of their vaccination status.  This information will be centrally collected via Docs.  Employees will receive further instructions via email on how to complete the upload process.  Vaccination status information will be treated as confidential medical information and be shared within EPAM on a need-to-know basis only for health and safety and staffing administration purposes.  The actual proof documents will be accessible within HR only.  For employees that are supporting client accounts with additional vaccination requirements, EPAM may provide an attestation to the client of employees’ vaccination status, or in limited circumstances where required the proof of vaccination status\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Acceptable vaccine record documents include: a CDC Card, medical records, immunization records from a public health system, or other official documentation showing name, type of vaccine, date(s), and name of administering professional or clinic site. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"*\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Due to current state law requirements, employees located in Florida, Texas, and Montana may apply for an exception by contacting their People Partner.  Any employee approved for an exception will be subject to strict recurring testing protocols.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
